name: .PLP File Extension
summary: Learn about .PLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Locked picture created by Photo Locker, an Android app used to hide photos on your device; stores a picture that has been "locked" by the app in order to hide the image from being viewed by others.

content: You can manually restore your locked PLP pictures by navigating to the Photo Locker folder in your device's storage. Then rename the ".plp" file extension of your picture(s) with the ".jpg" or ".png" extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.caption: PLP file open in GRAPHISOFT Archicad 26
